thread.section_title: La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: St Patricks day weekend
thread.title_full: St Patricks day weekend - Review of La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: David J
title: St Patricks day weekend
text:
A group of 3 couples decided to go to NYC for St Patrick's day weekend and we found La Quinta on West 32nd st to be the best price around so we decided to give it a shot. Plus it was very close (2 blocks walking distance) to Penn Station. We were all pleasantly surprised with this hotel. The rooms were small but plenty of room for the weekend. Very clean rooms and hotel spotless. Free continental breakfast was a plus. Every employee we met were more than accommodating. We would defiantly use this hotel again. Also convenient to the subways to all Manhattan locations 1/2 block away at Greeley Square Station.
Room Tip: Top floors have the best view. Back of the hotel has views of the empire state building See more room tips
